# Vectorized function

```{python}
def addsubtract(a,b):
   if a > b:
       return a - b
   else:
       return a + b

```

```{python}
addsubtract(2,3)
addsubtract([2,4],[3,-1])
```

```{python}
addsubtract(
  np.array([2,4]),
  np.array([3,-1])
)
```

```{python}
vec_addsubtract = np.vectorize(addsubtract)
```

```{python}
vec_addsubtract(
  np.array([2,4]),
  np.array([3,-1])
)
vec_addsubtract(
  [2,4],
  [3,-1]
)
```

## 範例2：

$$
y=\left[\begin{array}{c}
2\\
-1\\
3
\end{array}\right],\ x_{1}=\left[\begin{array}{c}
1\\
-1\\
1
\end{array}\right],\ x_{2}=\left[\begin{array}{c}
4\\
7\\
3
\end{array}\right]
\]
$$



```{python}
x1=np.array([1,-1,1])
x1.shape=(3,1)

x2=np.array([4,7,3])
x2.shape=(3,1)

X=np.column_stack((x1,x2))

# x(xt x)^-1 xt

Px=X@inv(X.T@X)@X.T
Px
```

```{python}
y=np.array([2,-1,3])
y.shape=(3,1)
```

```{python}
y_hat=Px@y
```

```{python}
y_hat
y
e=y-y_hat
e
```

```{python}
y_hat.T@e
```

```{python}
(e.T@e)**(1/2)
```
